citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on
08-AUG-18.
The licensee's previous optimal hours have changed. Neither the licensee nor any knowledgeable facility
representative were available at the time of the attempt.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on
08-AUG-18.
The licensee's previous optimal hours have changed.  Neither the licensee nor any knowledgeable facility
representative were available at the time of the attempt.
